data.eml:eml: Nesodiprion orientalis sp. nov., N. japonicus, and N. biremis, with a key to species of Nesodiprion (Hymenoptera, Diprionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hara, Hideho, Smith, David R. (2012): Nesodiprion orientalis sp. nov., N. japonicus, and N. biremis, with a key to species of Nesodiprion (Hymenoptera, Diprionidae). Zootaxa 3503: 1-24, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209562
